mapper.select: SELECT applicationNum, applicationName, companyId, workingArea, career, education, employmentType, salary, roleId, DATE_FORMAT(deadlineDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS deadlineDate FROM applications WHERE companyId = #{companyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Applications (applicationName, companyId, career, education, salary, workingArea, employmentType, roleId, filename) VALUES (#{dto.applicationName}, #{dto.companyId}, #{dto.career}, #{dto.education}, #{dto.salary}, #{dto.workingArea}, #{dto.employmentType}, 1 ,#{dto.fileName})
